CommentBody:
Elizaveta replied to customer and clarified the questions.

1) we haven’t automated the connection to AzureAD and this is the reason why it doesn’t appear in the scheduler. You can still upload json reports with the command line PingCastle.exe —api-flags to be set —upload-all-reports. This will upload all reports in the current directory 
2) the error means STATUS_ACCESS_DENIED (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-erref/596a1078-e883-4972-9bbc-49e60bebca55) which means that the mitigation against zero logon is active
